info.document:
REUTERS TELEVISION OUTLOOK FOR SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 16, 2017
EDITORS PLEASE NOTE: SLUGS AND TIMINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE 
LIVE 
0150-0315/0450-0815GMT
NORTHKOREA-MISSILES/BORDER
PAJU, SOUTH KOREA - A look of North Korean territory seen from a border with South Korea amid mounting tensions a day after North Korea fired a missile that flew over Japan's Hokkaido far out into the Pacific Ocean.
REUTERS (ACCESS ALL)
16:9 / HD
0150-0300GMT (estimated in&out time)
MYANMAR-ROHINGYA/INDONESIA-PROTESTS
JAKARTA, INDONESIA - Indonesian Muslims state a protest demanding justice for the persecuted Rohingya minority in Myanmar.
REUTERS (ACCESS ALL)
16:9 / SD
EDITS
16/09 NORTHKOREA-MISSILES/BORDER: PAJU - A look of North Korean territory seen from a border with South Korea amid mounting tensions a day after North Korea fired a missile that flew over Japan's Hokkaido far out into the Pacific Ocean. EXPECT 0530GMT 
16/09 MYANMAR-ROHINGYA/INDONESIA-PROTESTS: JAKARTA - Indonesian political party organizes anti-Myanmar protest, the latest in a series of protests and rallies for Rohingya in the Muslim-majority nation's capital. EXPECT 0500GMT

16/09 NORTHKOREA-MISSILES/CHINA: DANDONG - People in China's border town of Dandong react after North Korea fired a missile that flew over north Japan. EXPECT 0430GMT 
16/09 ASIA-STORM/VIETNAM: NGHE AN , VIETNAM - Aftermath after Typhoon Doksuri tore a destructive path across central Vietnam on Friday, flooding hundreds of thousands of homes, whipping off roofs and knocking out power in the country's most powerful storm in years. DELIVERY TBA 
16/09 MYANMAR-ROHINGYA/BANGLADESH: COX'S BAZAR, BANGLADESH - Bangladesh struggles to cope with about 400,000 Rohingya refugees fleeing violence in Myanmar, while aid agencies call for ramped-up efforts to ease the crisis. DELIVERY TO SINGAPORE TBA 
THE FOLLOWING FILE IS AVAILABLE ON WNE
03/09 7066 CAMBODIA-POLITICS/OPPOSITION-FILE 
03/09 0006 NORTHKOREA-NUCLEAR/FILE
14/09 1225-NORTHKOREA-MISSILES/FILE
Reuters Television, Asia Desk
+65-6870-3795
